short_summary: Replace water tank at Miette Hot Springs in Jasper National Park
description: Contract to replace source water collection tank at Miette Hot Springs in Jasper National Park. The Work includes demolition of the existing concrete source water collection tank, and the supply and installation of a new steel-bolted source water collection tank, along with supporting process piping and ancillary equipment.
